executeImmediate

protected ResultSet executeImmediate(String sql)
                              throws SQLException
Executes the SQL statement.

Parameters:
sql - The sql, as a string, to execute
Returns:
ResultSet
Throws:
SQLException - if the prepared statement is closed or there is a database error. caught Exceptions are thrown as SQLExceptions with the description "08S01".
